name: Wasteland Kings Mobile
description:
Wasteland Kings is a game created and developed by Vlambeer for Mojam 2013. Currently this game is known as Nuclear Throne (which I have ported too).
Wasteland Kings source code was publicly released with other Vlambeer games projects on Humble Bundle for everyone.
Port is based on Karu's WK 60 fps mod (I cut this feature) https://steamcommunity.com/app/242680/discussions/0/361787186420525882/

This game was ported for Nuclear Throne Mobile 2 year anniversary in under ~2.5h and it won't recieve any updates.

WKM features:
- Customiseable controls
- Better player wall collisions
- Background music bugfixes
- Compatability for mobile touch-screen
- It's absolutely free and made with love <3
